directions: In a 3-quart heavy saucepan stir together all ingredients except scallion and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook, covered, until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Fluff rice with a fork and stir in scallion.
ingredients: 1 1/3 cups Texmati rice* (American basmati) or brown basmati rice**
*available at specialty foods shops and some supermarkets
**available at Indian markets, natural foods stores, and some specialty foods shops
title: Basmati Rice with Mustard Seeds and Golden Raisins
